storyInfo: Wicked men take advantage of a young and willful Gnosis, putting Enciodes in danger, but also marking the beginning of a beautiful friendship.

attributes.content: Three times the fowlbeast has flown past the window. Perhaps it had already flown past many times before Gnosis noticed it.
The fowlbeasts of Kjerag build their nests in the mountains. The adults leave their nests before the sun rises, foraging in human lands.
The cold climate has made them strong and sturdy.
Track the flight of a fowlbeast, and one will find that they traverse half of Kjerag in the span of a single day.
At least, that is what the books at home say.
Let's continue from where we left off yesterday, then.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: The institutions of Kjerag share certain characteristics with Victoria.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: The three clans are analogous to the grand dukes of Victoria, while the Vine-Bear Court performs some of the functions of the king.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: By understanding Victoria's institutions, you will gain a greater understanding of where the two systems are similar, and an even greater understanding of where they are different.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Do you concur, Master Enciodes?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: I think I know what you mean.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Kjerag's institutions are built upon faith in Kjeragandr. Therefore, despite the similarities with Victoria's institutions, they are fundamentally different.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As written in the 'Kjeragandr', the three clans formed a covenant with Kjeragandr to lead the people. The mantle of authority is merely an insignificant reward.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: On this point, the relationship between the three clans and the Vine-Bear Court is fundamentally different from the relationship between the Victorian dukes and the king.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Excellent, Master Enciodes...
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Gnosis pays no heed to the exchange, letting his mind wander and imagine the fowlbeast outside the winding gliding on the winds.
These fowlbeasts are smart creatures. They are waiting for leftovers from lunch that the kitchens will throw out soon. The Silverash food is among the finest in Kjerag, after all.
After they have had their fill, they will fly towards Lake Silberneherze, frolicking on the meadows there, or interact with the burdenbeasts basking in the sun.
If they are lucky, they will be thrown a scalecis or two by the fincatchers on the ice.
When the sun sets in the west, they will return to their warm nests and put an end to a productive day, like someone who has just finished a hard day of work.
This concludes today's lesson.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: We will have our regular short quiz now.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Gnosis stares at the quiz paper. He finds the questions even easier than a fowlbeast finds looking for food.
His mind wanders to how fowlbeasts live their entire lives between looking for food and sleeping, interposed by the occasional territorial conflict, day after day, year after year, until they die.
It seems almost like there is some kind of law governing it, because the fowlbeasts of Kjerag do not appear to ever think about flying beyond the mountains.
Time's up.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: I had two questions that I wasn't sure about. What about you, Gnosis?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Let me guess, you finished ages ago.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Hm? Some of your answers are different from mine—
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Now, now, Master Enciodes, Master Gnosis grew up in the Edelweiss sea of books.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Your advantages lie elsewhere, do they not?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Is that supposed to console me?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Put it another way, the higher Master Gnosis's academic achievements, the more help you will receive as the future head of Clan Silverash.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Shoot, I need to meet Matterhorn. I'll be going.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Say, Gnosis—
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: One moment, please, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Did you need something, Enciodes?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Oh, er, it's nothing important.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Here's your last test back.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Full marks, as usual.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Your grades are spectacular, Gnosis. You're the brightest student I've ever seen.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I can already picture you on a bigger stage when you study abroad in Victoria.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Patriarch Olafur's study abroad policy is practically tailored to you.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: But this supposed signature of your father's is forged, isn't it?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: I'm guessing you didn't think you could keep it hidden forever. Your family will eventually find out, after all.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: But the longer it takes for them to find out, the better your chance of making this a done deal.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: This is the best you could do.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: But it's not enough.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Tell me, Gnosis, what do you think of Kjerag after learning about Victoria's institutions?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Don't worry, this is a private conversation. You can trust me to keep a secret.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: It's backwards and inefficient.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: What do you think about Enciodes, then?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: ...He will be a respectable leader.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: But i don't understand him.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: What don't you understand?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: His sense of duty, like he was born to lead Kjerag.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Ah, good. You're even more radical than I thought.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: It appears that knowledge has given you more questions than it has answers.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Kjerag is clearly too small for you, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Don't fool yourself. You would forge your father's signature in order to study abroad.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: You want to get out, don't you?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: My father would never agree.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Your little trick won't work. But I can help you.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: I can act as if I never noticed. I could even pretend to have seen your father and gotten his consent for you to study abroad.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Because you're like me.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: I'm on your side, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Friends help each other. I helped you. Now I need you to help me with something.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Gnosis!
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Enciodes? You're back?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I was going to ask you to come along, but then you had to stay late.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Go along where?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The first train that Father purchased from Victoria is making a test run today. Do you want to watch?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Why me?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Hm... because we're classmates?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Plus, aren't you interested? It's a train! Kjerag's first ever!
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: 'I'm not interested. I'm going home.'
The words die in his throat.
He could imagine what awaits him back home.
His mother preparing dinner, waiting for his son to bring good news about his studies.
His father buried in his research in a sea of books, with eyes only for the millennia of Kjerag history.
He probably does not know what time it is. He probably does not remember what his son is doing.
When he reads something that excites him, he will call out to his son, then his wife will tell him that his son is studying with the son of Master Olafur.
He would mutter a response and continue with his research. By the time his son came home, he would have forgotten what he wanted to say.
He would talk nonstop at the dinner table about what he discovered that day, and what he would discover the next.
To Gnosis, his father is like a drowning man stretching out his hand to tell his son about all the mysteries hidden in the lake.
If that is the case—
Well? What's the answer? Are you going or not?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: ...I'm going.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: That's more like it!
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Shh—
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Alright, the coast is clear.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Why is the scion of Silverash acting like a thief?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Because Father won't actually let me watch.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: He says that the train is still being tested, and it might be dangerous.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Then you—
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'm curious.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We so much to learn about engineering, science, and literature every day. It makes my head want to explode.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But it's things that we have to learn. So I want to at least see what learning these things could do for me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You don't like them either?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Well... I didn't, at first.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But I found a way.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: A way?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I began thinking about what knowledge can become.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: For example, all the knowledge about engineering that eventually becomes a train.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I've found that it motivates me to study when I actually get to see the things I read about.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You're so strange.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Am I?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Just imagine. This train will let us traverse all of Kjerag in a single day once it enters service.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And we built it with our own hands. It's exciting, isn't it?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You're even more childish than I thought.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I don't want to be like my father, always engaged in a battle of wit and will against nobles and merchants from abroad. He doesn't even smile when he's with his family.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: He didn't use to be like that.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You're going to be a leader. You need to get used to it.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Maybe. If that's the case, then at least I'll smile and laugh to my heart's content before I get to that point.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Say, I used to think you were one of those people whose brain is filled with Kjerag history and nothing else.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But you're always watching the fowlbeasts outside the window. That's when I began to think that you may be different from how I imagined.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Do you enjoy observing them?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: No—
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The train's about to stop.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Let's get off here. We'll get a terrible earful if we're found out.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Enciodes.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Would you accompany me somewhere?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Why did you bring me here?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Friends help each other. I helped you. Now I need you to help me with something.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Bring Enciodes. I want to have a chat with him too.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: I'm not sure. But the teacher said he wanted to see you here?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: He did?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: No need to get excited. Just letting Master Enciodes take a little nap.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Sir?!
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Take him.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Righto.
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Now, now, be gentle with the young master.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'll be careful. He's our money, after all.
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Who are you?!
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Just a tutor who was hired to instruct the scions of Clans Silverash and Edelweiss.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Being a tutor doesn't pay that well, though, so I started a little side business.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: What do you want?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Don't look at me like that. You brought him here, didn't you?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Why you—!
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: My dear Master Gnosis, did you really think I didn't talk to your parents?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Just as you suspected, your father refused to consent to you studying abroad, and your mother is against it too.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: You believe you could make this a done deal, but my feeling is that they will come after you, no matter how far you run.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: I'm helping you, Master Gnosis.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: If you want to leave Kjerag, get away from this boring, dead-end life—
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Tell your parents and Master Olafur...
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: That Master Enciodes and you will be sowing your wild oats for a while, and you don't want to be disturbed.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Master Olafur? It's me, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Yes, Master Enciodes is with me.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'm sorry, we sneaked onto the train. I just wanted to let you know, so you won't worry too much about us.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: ...No, he hasn't caused me any trouble. It was I—
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: When will we be back?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Gnosis looks up to see a flock of fowlbeasts streak across the sky.
A young fowlbeast separates from the flock, flying off in another direction, beyond the snow-capped mountains.
The northern wind often gives fledglings reckless courage, the belief that they can break the iron-clad rules, but it is often cruel reality that awaits.
He's known this.
He's known he is not ready.
Perhaps he would still try to fly beyond the mountains, but not in this way.
Don't worry, we'll be back soon.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Any movement?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: I hope you brought good news.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: I—I talked to them. They won't suspect anything for a while.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Looks like you kept our deal.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: How did these people—
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Well, if you really want to know... they just marched in like they owned the place.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Kjerag is too primitive. This might be the easiest job we've ever done.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: What are you going to do to Enciodes?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Easy. Make Master Olafur pay a little price for his carelessness.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Then, we head for Victoria.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: We?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Yes, we.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Did you think I was going to fail to uphold my end of the deal?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Isn't that what crooks do best?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Now, don't be so sarcastic, boy.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: You can hate me now.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: I'll send you to school, help you learn whatever you want. All I ask is a little favor every now and then.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: It's a good deal, isn't it?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Enciodes must be hungry. I'll bring him his food.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Sure... You can say goodbye.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Oh, I didn't expect you. I thought it would be somebody else.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Are you sure about revealing your involvement? Things won't go well for you if I somehow manage to get out.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You sure are confident.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Just a little joke.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: My family—
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: They don't know yet.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Yes, with your cover story, it'll take them some time to realize that I've been kidnapped.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Our teacher sure is thorough, isn't he?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It's time to eat.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: How am I supposed to eat with my hands tied behind my back?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Go on, feed me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Thanks. The taste's not so bad.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Aren't you scared?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Sure I'm scared. But that won't help. I was thinking maybe I should get used to this.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Are you out of your mind?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: This is the state of Kjerag right now. So weak that this may not be the last time something like this happens.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Are you going to leave Kjerag with that man?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: None of your business.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I would say it is, given that it was passage bought with my safety.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: ...I suppose you're right.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Why? Did you dislike Kjerag?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I don't dislike it. I just... I don't know. I don't understand why people like my father would bury their heads in history, obsessing over the events of the past.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I can't help but feel the urge to run away when I think about how I'm supposed to become a scholar like him.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Ah, your father. We've met a few times. Not the easiest man to get along with.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I should have invited you to my house more often.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Maybe I wouldn't have had to deal with my two sisters so much if I introduced you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I doubt I would have gotten along with them either.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Is there anything you want to do once you get out?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: ...I haven't decided.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Well, that's not good. But then, my father says that he began his studies with no particular goal in mind, then began to find one along the way.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You're the one in danger. Stop worrying about me.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Come now, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You wanted to leave Kjerag because it's boring. Am I right?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Not entirely.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You wouldn't understand.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I suppose I wouldn't. Not entirely, at least.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But what if I told you that I can make Kjerag less boring?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I haven't told anyone else. Keep it secret for me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I understand why Father says that Kjerag is weak and needs to learn to accept compromise.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But I'm getting tired of seeing him bow his head to foreigners. It's like you said: Boring.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We need to be stronger, tougher, fiercer. Let the foreigners know that they can't walk over the people of Kjerag so easily.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Shh—
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Alright, visiting hours are over.
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: What are you dallying for? The boss is looking for you. I'll watch this one.
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Do you always carry an Arts Unit with you, Gnosis?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I took the scenic route.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Don't move, I'll untie you.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I felt safer when I was tied up.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: They don't see Kjerag as an equal partner. Give them an inch, and they'll take a mile.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Makes sense.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'm sorry... I didn't know he would do that.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'm starting to like you, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I thought our little chat was proof enough that I forgive you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: This is this and that is that.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Getting you kidnapped and rescuing you after having second thoughts are two different matters.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: That's what I like.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: So, do you have a plan to get away?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: A sliver of one. I've been thinking about it.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: So you came to rescue me from the get-go?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That's not what I said.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Gotcha!
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: What's that? Trying to scratch an itch?
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Surrender, and maybe the boss will let you off easy.
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: In your dreams.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Gugh—
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: You... won't... get... away...
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Well, that was close.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Can I ask a question?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You're intentionally making noise along the way, right? Like how you used Arts in that fight just now.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Yes, because—
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Here they come.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: This was not smart, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: I agree.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Can you tell me why?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: It's true that I don't like my life right now.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I don't know what kind of life I want.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: But that doesn't mean I want to leave with you.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: What a shame.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: You've lost your one shot at freedom.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Here, you'll never know how big the world outside is.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Not necessarily.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: How do you know that world doesn't lie in the future of Kjerag?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: My dear Master Enciodes, do you really think that Victoria will allow you to develop?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: Victoria takes pity on Kjerag at the moment, because you're too weak.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: They will reap the fruit that belongs to them, when the time comes.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: You're only 'developing' for their sake.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: I've heard this many times, and my answer is the same as my father's.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We'll see.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Hah. Do you think you'll get the chance?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: You're a long way from town. Even if your father realizes you've disappeared, it'll take a long time for him to find you.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: No one will save you.
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You outsiders don't know Kjerag.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: A lot of wild burdenbeasts live in these lush forests.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Before the people of Kjerag learned to domesticate them, this was where they caught wild burdenbeasts and tamed them. You're hiding in one of the old ruins that they left behind.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Burdenbeasts? What are those docile animals going to do?
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: A common misunderstanding. Burdenbeasts are not naturally docile. The tame ones that you see are the result of centuries of domestication.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: In the wild, burdenbeasts are—
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: What's going on?!
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter A

attributes.content: Over there! Burdenbeasts! A whole stampede of them!
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter B

attributes.content: Wild burdenbeasts don't like to be disturbed while they're resting.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Get them!
attributes.name: Teacher

attributes.content: You better know how to ride a burdenbeast, Enciodes!
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Ha! Who do you think you're talking to?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: (Excited cry)
attributes.name: Wild Burdenbeast

attributes.content: Good boy, good boy.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: (Placid cry)
attributes.name: Wild Burdenbeast

attributes.content: Sorry to interrupt your rest.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You can go now.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: (Low cry)
attributes.name: Wild Burdenbeast

attributes.content: We should be safe now.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Yes, the commotion has probably caught the attention of people in town. All we need to do is hide until they find us.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Then—
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Well, let's hope Master Olafur's fury doesn't extend to my family.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: What are you talking about, Gnosis?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You're the hero who rescued me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You must be joking. No excuse can change the fact that I—
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: What does it matter? Friends are supposed to forgive each other's mistakes.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Friends?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Friends.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Matterhorn has been with me since I was little, and Weiss's situation is kind of unusual. I don't have any other friends.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You'll be the first.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Let's make a promise, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'll make Kjerag big enough for you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And you'll stay.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What kind of promise is that?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: No good?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If we're going to do this, we'll make Kjerag big enough for the both of us.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You're on board?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You did say I'm the first friend you've made other than Matterhorn and Weiss?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I did.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You're my first friend, too.
attributes.name: Gnosis
